definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Her love for "Lord of the Rings" followed.
I am really into high-fantasy things like "Lord of the Rings" and medieval RPG video games.
sentences.chinese: 我對於象指環王還有中世紀的RPG遊戲非常癡迷。

sentences.english: These rings are not valuesd because they are set with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 這些指環的價值並不在於它們鑲有寶石。

sentences.english: All three movies in The Lord of the Rings series were filmed in New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 《指環王》三部曲均在新西蘭拍攝。

sentences.english: These rings are not valued because they are set with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 這些指環的價值並不在於它們鑲有寶石。
來自理查德，瓦格納的，尼伯龍根的指環。

sentences.english: I need not wear a diamond ring.
sentences.chinese: 我就不用戴燦爛的指環。

sentences.english: Losing the ring upset her very much.
sentences.chinese: 指環的遺失使她很心煩意亂。

sentences.english: The ring may have been formed when two galactic clusters collided.
sentences.chinese: 這個‘指環’可能是在兩個星團發生碰撞時形成的。

sentences.english: No, we're not just talking Lord of the Rings here. We're talking about ...
sentences.chinese: 不過我們在這兒說的不僅僅是指環王。
